REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0586 reute r f BC-PUBCO-<PUBO>-CHARIMAN 03-13 0054

TEXT.TITLE: PUBCO <PUBO> CHARIMAN RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Pubco Corp said Maurice Saltzman had resigned as chairman and a director of the company, effective immediately, due to continuing health problems. At the same time, it said Saltzman resigned as chairman and a director of its 32 pct owned Bobbie Brooks Inc <BBKS>. Reuter
